trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> objects used by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> to override the default way it serializes a class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" />가 클래스를 serialize하는 기본 방식을 재정의하는 데 사용하는 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 개체의 컬렉션을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> is returned by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlElements%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> 에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlElements%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> class and the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> class, you can override the default way that the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> 클래스 및 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> 클래스 기본값을 재정의할 수 있는 것는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 클래스를 직렬화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes the `Transportation` class, which contains a single field named `Vehicles` that returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 serialize 된 `Transportation` 라는 단일 필드를 포함 하는 클래스 `Vehicles` 반환 하는 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The example first applies two instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> class to the `Vehicles` field that specifies the types of objects the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> inserts into the array.
trans-unit.target: 두 인스턴스를 먼저 적용 하는 예제는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> 클래스를 `Vehicles` 개체의 유형을 지정 하는 필드는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 을 배열에 삽입 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates two <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> objects to override the behavior of the attributes applied to the `Vehicles` property.
trans-unit.target: 이 예에서는 다음 두 개의 만듭니다 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> 에 적용 된 특성의 동작을 재정의 하는 개체는 `Vehicles` 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The two overriding objects are added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> collection of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 재정의 개체에 추가 됩니다는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> 컬렉션은 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Lastly, the example adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>, allowing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to insert the new object types into the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> returned by the `Vehicles` field.
trans-unit.target: 마지막으로,이 예제에서는 추가 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> 에 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>시켜는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 삽입할 새 개체 종류에는 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> 에서 반환 되는 `Vehicles` 필드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> to add.
Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> to the collection.
The zero-based index of the newly added item.

The following example creates two <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> objects and calls the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes.Add%2A> method to add them to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 개의 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> 개체와 호출 된 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes.Add%2A> 메서드를 추가 하는 프로그램 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The example then adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>, which is used to create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that can serialize an instance of the `Transportation` class.
trans-unit.target: 이 예에서는 다음 추가 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> 에 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>를 만드는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 의 인스턴스를 serialize 할 수 있는 `Transportation` 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> to look for.
Determines whether the collection contains the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 지정된 개체가 들어 있는지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object exists in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 개체가 컬렉션에 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> array to hold the copied elements.
The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>배열</c>에서 복사를 시작할 인덱스입니다. 이 인덱스는 0부터 시작합니다.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" />, or a portion of it to a one-dimensional array.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> whose index is being retrieved.
Gets the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" />.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" />.
The zero-based index where the member is inserted.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> to insert.
Inserts an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> into the collection.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 인덱스에 있는 요소를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
<paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" />.
The property is set and the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 속성이 설정되어 있으며 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes" />가 읽기 전용인 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> to remove from the collection.
Removes the specified object from the collection.
